### Description

Areas over which each variable was measured:

- <b>Blue rectangles</b>: SST (same for SST and upwelling index, see *About* for details)
- <b>Red rectangles</b>: AT (air temperature, same at ground level and at 2m height)
- <b>Black rectangles</b>: chlorophyll-a
- <b>Bubble markers</b>: *percebes* sampling points (data not disclosed)
